title: redevelopment of the entire open land and/or built-up area of the premises of a cotton textile mill which is not sick or closed, but requiring modernization on the same land as approved by the competent authorities, such development or redevelopment shall be permitted by the Commissioner, subject to the condition that it shall also be in accordance with scheme approved by Government, provided that, with regards to the utilization of built up area, the provisions of clause (a) of sub-Regulation (1) of this Regulation shall apply
clause_text: redevelopment of the entire open land and/or built-up area of the premises of a cotton textile mill which is not sick or closed, but requiring modernization on the same land as approved by the competent authorities, such development or redevelopment shall be permitted by the Commissioner, subject to the condition that it shall also be in accordance with scheme approved by Government, provided that, with regards to the utilization of built up area, the provisions of clause (a) of sub-Regulation (1) of this Regulation shall apply.
